amendment.description: An amendment numbered 24 printed in Part A of House Report 115-711 to permit a non-federal flood control project sponsor to pay, or contribute to, the difference between the cost of repairing a damaged flood control project and its projected economic benefits.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bost amendment (A024) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A024) offered by Mr. Bost.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Bost amendment (A024) Agreed to by voice vote.
